item.title: Taylor Swift Billboard Music Awards Wins Smash NEW Record
item.dc:creator: Simon Delott
item.description:
Reading Time: 4 minutesTaylor Swift has smashed a new record at the Billboard Music Awards. Earlier this month, Beyonce was named the #1 …

Taylor Swift Billboard Music Awards Wins Smash NEW Record was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 4 minutes

Taylor Swift has smashed a new record at the Billboard Music Awards.

Earlier this month, Beyonce was named the #1 pop star of the Twenty-First Century. Less than a quarter of the way in, that may have been a little premature.

Taylor was her closest competition for the title. But Taylor is not without awards of her own.

At the Billboard Music Awards, she attained a new milestone — and defeated a controversial singer.

Taylor Swift has achieved another milestone at the Billboard Music Awards

Thursday, December 12 was a big night for awards shows. In addition to the Game Awards, it was the night of he 2024 Billboard Music Awards.

Taylor Swift didn’t just take home 10 awards. Though she very much did that, earning titles as Top Artist, Top Female Artist, Top Billboard 200 Artist, Top Hot 100 Artist, Hot 100 Songwriter, Top Streaming Songs Artist, and Top Billboard 200.

Additionally, she earned the title of most decorated winner. She has a total of 49 Billboard Music Awards trophies from over the course of her monumental career.

Prior to Thursday night’s awards show, Taylor had 39 trophies — and was tied with Drake, who also had 39 awards. Despite the deep controversies surrounding the rapper, he took home three awards on Thursday night.

However, if our math is correct, 42 is still less than 49. Which means that Taylor is no longer tied, and has an unmatched collection of Billboard Music Awards.

Taylor Swift addressed the Billboard Music Awards audience in a pre-recorded speech. In particular, she thanked those who “care about our albums and come see us in concert.”

Taylor Swift gave the Billboard Music Awards audience a speech

“Everything that’s happened with the Eras Tour and ‘The Tortured Poets Department,’ I just have to say thank you,” Taylor expressed.

“It means the world to me that you guys have embraced the things I’ve made,” she told the audience. “And,” she added, “the fact that you’ve cared so much about my music.”

In reference to the fact that Friday, December 13 is her birthday, Taylor noted that the award was “the nicest early birthday present” and was “exactly what I wanted.”

This is, of course, not Taylor’s first time dominating at the Billboard Music Awards — or any other awards category.

In 2022, Taylor became the first first artist — ever — to occupy the top ten spots on the Billboard Hot 100. That was with tracks from Midnights.

That record was later broken in 2024 when an artist occupied the top fourteen spots on that same list. Obviously, that artist was Taylor. This time, the album was The Tortured Poets Department.

She remains undefeated

Taylor Swift’s The Tortured Poets Department spent a whopping sixteen weeks at the No. 1 spot on the Billboard 200 albums chart. Even though she’s certainly had better albums, none of those have matched that achievement — a testament to her popularity.

In 2023, by the way, Taylor became the only living artist to have five of her albums appear in the Top 10 at the same time.

Beyonce has accomplished tremendous things to get where she is in the industry. But she and Taylor are often viewed as neck-and-neck for a reason.

Taylor Swift Billboard Music Awards Wins Smash NEW Record was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: 2019 Billboard Music Awards: Who Took Home the Top Prizes?
item.dc:creator: Tyler Johnson
item.description:
Reading Time: 4 minutesThe 2019 Billboard Music Awards were held last night, and just like every year, the most popular artists took home …

2019 Billboard Music Awards: Who Took Home the Top Prizes? was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 4 minutes

The 2019 Billboard Music Awards were held last night, and just like every year, the most popular artists took home the night’s top prizes.

That’s not a knock against the show — the whole point is awarding the artists who sold the most copies last year.

The BBMAs differ from other music awards in that there’s no voting and no panel of judges.

It hands out prizes based on digital and streaming sales (and if there’s anyone out there buying physical copies of new music from new artists, we suppose that counts, too).

It’s fine, we guess, except it kind of ruins the suspense, as everyone in the room knows the winner long before the presenter opens the envelope.

(Also, isn’t selling the most copies already enough of a reward?)

Anyway, as is so often the case at these ceremonies Drake was the night’s big winner, taking home 12 trophies to make him the most-awarded artist in BBMA history, with a total of 27 wins.

He also delivered the night’s funniest moment, offering a shout-out to Arya Stark for killing the Night King — truly the top achievement of 2019 thus far.

Here’s a full list of the top awards handed out at last night’s BBMAs:

If you came in looking for the biggest names in music and a night of chart-topping craziness Sunday night, you came to the right place.

The 2017 Billboard Music Awards were handed out, with Luda and Vanessa Hudgens co-hosting (seriously) and some huge acts performing.

In all, about a dozen awards were handed out on air in between just as many star-studded songs, many of which we’ll be sharing shortly.

For now, see the full list of 2017 Billboard Music Awards winners below … did your favorite(s) take home any of this coveted hardware?

item.title: Madonna Defends Prince Tribute, Sends Message to Critics
item.dc:creator: Kay Rhodes
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesMadonna would like to apologize to anyone who has an issue with her tribute to Prince at the 2016 Billboard …

Madonna Defends Prince Tribute, Sends Message to Critics was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

Madonna would like to apologize to anyone who has an issue with her tribute to Prince at the 2016 Billboard Music Awards on Sunday night.

She understands your criticism and she didn’t mean to offend you and she knows she did not do the late musician proud and…

… JUST KIDDING!

Does that sound remotely like Madonna to you?

Just hours after The Material Girl sang a version of "Nothing Compares 2 U" and then joined Steve Wonder for a duet of "Purple Rain," BET called out Madonna for what that network deemed to be a terrible performance.

Hyping its own Prince tribute at the BET Awards on June 16, this is what the network Tweeted:

See the message on the bottom?

Pretty harsh, huh?

Even before Madonna took to the Billboard Music Awards stage, a change.org petition compiled over 8,000 signatures, urging almost any big name aside from this legendary artist to honor Prince, who died on April 21 at the age of 57.

This, despite the fact that Madonna collaborated with Prince back in 1989 and even once dated the superstar.

What does Madonna have to say to these critics?

“Deal with it,” she wrote last night on Instagram alongside a photo of her decked in an all-purple getup.

Several hours later, she returned to elaborate via a second post:

“Anyone who wants to do a tribute to Prince is welcome to. Whatever your age Gender or skin Color. If you loved him and he inspired you then show it!!!! I love Prince 4 ever.”

Sounds pretty reasonable, doesn’t it?

With so many awards shows on the docket, we can expect an endless number of Prince-themed performances over the next few months.

Instead of criticizing the ones you don’t like, let’s all use them as an opportunity to remember the reason why they exist in the first place:

Prince is dead. Prince is an icon. And Prince deserves to be honored in as many ways as Hollywood can honor him.

Billboard Music Awards 2016: Watch the Performances!

VIEW GALLERY

Madonna Defends Prince Tribute, Sends Message to Critics was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Billboard Music Awards 2016: List of Winners!
item.dc:creator: Free Britney
item.description:
Reading Time: 3 minutesThe top names in music and pop culture came together for a night of chart-topping craziness Sunday at the 2015 …

Billboard Music Awards 2016: List of Winners! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 3 minutes

The top names in music and pop culture came together for a night of chart-topping craziness Sunday at the 2015 Billboard Music Awards.

Without question, Britney Spears was the star of the night.

The pop singer’s return to early 2000s hotness made the most headlines – and deservedly so – in an event designed to produce them.

But who actually took home the top prizes Sunday?

Not Madonna’s Prince tribute, that’s for sure. (Sorry.) Peep the complete list of winners from the 2016 Billboard Music Awards below:

Top Artist: Adele — WINNER

Billboard Chart Achievement Award (Fan-Voted): Rihanna — WINNER

Top R&B Song: The Weeknd, “The Hills” — WINNER

Top Billboard 200 Album: Adele, 25 — WINNER

Top Male Artist: Justin Bieber — WINNER

Top Country Song: Thomas Rhett, “Die A Happy Man” — WINNER

Top Hot 100 Song: Wiz Khalifa ft. Charlie Puth, “See You Again” — WINNER

Top Hot 100 Artist: The Weeknd — WINNER

Top New Artist: Fetty Wap — WINNER

Top Female Artist: Adele — WINNER

Britney Spears Gets SUPER Sexy: 2016 Billboard Music Awards

item.title: Britney Spears Did Her 2000 VMAs Self Proud at the 2016 Billboard Music Awards
item.dc:creator: Kelly Lynch
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesOHMYGODYOUREBACK! Last night, Britney Spears performed a medley of her greatest hits at the 2016 Billboard Music Awards. Wearing little …

Britney Spears Did Her 2000 VMAs Self Proud at the 2016 Billboard Music Awards was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

OHMYGODYOUREBACK!

Last night, Britney Spears performed a medley of her greatest hits at the 2016 Billboard Music Awards.

Wearing little more than fishnets and a few strands of sparkly red fabric, Spears KILLED IT on stage and reminded us of how unique the Brit of Yore once was.

She even made us LOLz a bit.

"After tonight… All I really want is a cheeseburger," Spears posted to Instagram with a photo of her ridiculous body.

The show took place in Las Vegas, where Spears has a residency at Planet Hollywood.

Last September, the Louisiana native announced that she’ll be staying on for two more years.

For those of you old enough to remember when the MTV Video Music Awards were awesome, I invite you to reminisce about Spears’ performance 2000 of "Oops!…I Did It Again" (with a "Satisfaction" intro that no one will ever forget).

Sometimes when I think about trying to diet (again), I play the video and watch the late 90s/early naughts princess of pop essentially ruin it for everyone else.

Many have attempted to top it, none have succeeded.

Heidi Montag thought she may have nailed it when she dressed up like Spears at the 2009 Miss Universe Pageant and lip synced her way through "Body Language," but she failed.

FAILED!

True, Spears is notorious for lip syncing, but at least she compensates through the magic of dance.

Christina Aguilera is better at singing, and we never expected her to do anything beyond making genie moves with her hands.  

For either woman to try and top the other would upset the balance of nature.

Last night almost makes you forget what happened at the 2007 MTV VMAs when the then-troubled singer phoned in her performance of "Gimme More."

It was horrific.  You could almost see the cloudy haze of sedatives swirling around her head.

"The production people at MTV were freaking out."

"Nobody can tell Britney what to do anymore. No one can control her. She is a mess," a source told the New York Post afterwards.

Prior to getting on stage, Spears got her buzz on.

"She went to her hotel and ordered a bunch of food and some margaritas," the source said.

"She came down an hour later with a frozen margarita in her hand."

The past is in the past.  Let’s relive last night’s performance!

Britney Spears Gets SUPER Sexy: 2016 Billboard Music Awards

VIEW GALLERY

Britney Spears Did Her 2000 VMAs Self Proud at the 2016 Billboard Music Awards was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Thousands Sign Petition to Revoke Iggy Azalea Billboard Award
item.dc:creator: Fantasia Glitzhips
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesThe right to petition is a fundamental value in the United States. And we are glad the American population is …

Thousands Sign Petition to Revoke Iggy Azalea Billboard Award was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

The right to petition is a fundamental value in the United States. And we are glad the American population is using for something important…

Like for protesting Iggy Azalea’s Billboard “Top Rap Song” Award.

Thousands of people have signed the change.org petition demanding Iggy be stripped of her award because her song “Fancy” did not meet eligibility requirement.

To be exact, 17,000 people have signed. The petition was started by Tennessee resident Christian Ferguson. It states:

“The eligibility time period for nominations is March 10th, 2014 through March 2015. ‘Fancy’ was released on February 17th, 2014, nearly a month before the eligibility starting.”

"This is unfair to the other nominees in these category, especially to ‘Anaconda’ by Nicki Minaj, who most likely would’ve won. Billboard did not follow their own guidelines and should have to recalculate these nominations without ‘Fancy’ as a nominee.”

“Fancy” was released last February, so it doesn’t fall within the required release dates.

The nominees were chosen on criteria such as album and digital song sales, radio plays, streams, touring and social media engagement. 

Touring, one of the points of consideration for the award, was not Iggy Azalea’s strong suit.  In fact, it was rumored that Iggy’s tour was canceled because of low ticket sales.

The song in question featured Charli XCX, and it made music history when it dominated the No. 1 spot on Billboard’s Hot 100 chart for seven consecutive weeks.

Azalea is not popular among celebs, either. Even Britney Spears threw shade at Iggy, and Iggy claims other rappers hate her because she is “so good.”

Iggy and Billboard have not commented on the petition.

2014 Billboard Music Awards Fashion: Who Dressed Best?

VIEW GALLERY

Thousands Sign Petition to Revoke Iggy Azalea Billboard Award was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Kanye West Blasts Billboard Music Awards for “Unwarranted Censorship”
item.dc:creator: Kay Rhodes
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesKanye West may want to just stop attending awards ceremonies altogether. The rapper has already blasted the Grammys for the …

Kanye West Blasts Billboard Music Awards for “Unwarranted Censorship” was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

Kanye West may want to just stop attending awards ceremonies altogether.

The rapper has already blasted the Grammys for the winners it selects every year, and now he’s positively gone off on the Billboard Music Awards.

On Sunday night, West took to the stage as the closing act of that event, performing a version of "All Day" that involved a lot of smoke… and even more bleeps.

Producers have said Kanye did not do a dress rehearsal and they simply assumed he would clean up the track’s dirty lyrics.

Once they realized he did not, the crew had to edit out seemingly every other word.

The crowd responded by booing West, who has no responded by slamming the Billboard Music Awards.

"Kanye West was grossly over-censored at the Billboard Music Award," a rep for the rapper says via statement. 

"Non-profane lyrics such as ‘with my leather black jeans on’ were muted for over 30 second intervals. As a result, his voice and performance were seriously misrepresented."

The rep continued:

"It is ridiculous that in 2015, unwarranted censorship is something that artists still have to fight against.

"Although West was clearly set up to face elements beyond his control during the live broadcast, he would like to apologize to the television audience who were unable to enjoy the performance the way he envisioned."

Aside from the censored lyrics, Kanye was scarcely visible due to lighting design and smoke effects. His team blames producers for that as well.

13 Great Kanye GIFs: Best of the West!

VIEW GALLERY

Kanye West Blasts Billboard Music Awards for “Unwarranted Censorship” was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Chris Brown Walks Billboard Music Awards Red Carpet with Royalty!
item.dc:creator: Free Britney
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesChris Brown and baby Royalty can’t get enough of each other. Fresh off their fun play date with Tyga and …

Chris Brown Walks Billboard Music Awards Red Carpet with Royalty! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

Chris Brown and baby Royalty can’t get enough of each other.

Fresh off their fun play date with Tyga and King, the father-daughter pair walked the red carpet together at the Billboard Music Awards last night.

Whatever you think of Chris, that little girl sure is precious …

He was not among the Billboard Music Awards performers, but the oft-troubled singer brought the best possible accessory with him Sunday.

Watching Brown proudly tote Royalty on the red carpet – dressed in her white jean jacket, tan tutu and Timberlands – was just the sweetest.

Not a word normally used to describe the R&B star, is it?

Just two months ago, news broke that Chris Brown fathered the nearly one-year-old girl, whose mother is Nia Amey-Guzman, hit the Internet.

This was not news to Chris, but it shocked everyone else, as he’d done a remarkable job keeping it under wraps for about a year and a half.

Even his (now not surprisingly EX) girlfriend Karrueche Tran found out after we did, so clearly, it was a situation he had a hard time managing.

Since then, though, adorable baby Royalty has been a visible part of her father’s life – increasingly and more lovingly so by the week, no less.

Sure, it helps his image to come across as a devoted father, but nothing about it feels fake or forced. Guy is truly smitten by his little angel.

Maybe this is finally what will make him clean up his act …

29 Pics of Chris Brown Thuggin’ It So Hard: What a Goon!

VIEW GALLERY

Chris Brown Walks Billboard Music Awards Red Carpet with Royalty! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Iggy Azalea Wins Top Rap Artist, Earns Wrath of Ice T
item.dc:creator: Kay Rhodes
item.description:
Reading Time: < 1 minuteIce T has sort of pulled a Kanye West. Just as Mr. Kim Kardashian has often made his opinion known when …

Iggy Azalea Wins Top Rap Artist, Earns Wrath of Ice T was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Ice T has sort of pulled a Kanye West.

Just as Mr. Kim Kardashian has often made his opinion known when disagreeing with certain award winners, Ice T took to Twitter last night and expressed a negative sentiment regarding one Billboard Music Awards outcome.

Iggy Azalea won Top Rap Artist…..  I’m done," Ice T wrote.

Azalea actually took home three trophies at the 2015 Billboard Music Awards on Sunday, winning Top Streaming Artist, Top Rap Artist and Top Rap Song for "Fancy" feat. Charli XCX.

She also performed a duet on stage with Britney Spears.

And while Ice T was the most famous critic of Izzy’s, he was far from alone in his assessment of her success.

“Can we all come to an agreement that Iggy Azalea is the worst person to walk the face of the Earth and should be imprisoned for her actions?” wrote @ObeyNudah, perhaps a bit harshly.

Another user added:

"Iggy Azalea is nominated for top rap artist which is ironic considering she’s not a rapper or an artist."

Azalea has faced criticism throughout her career, firing back at critics in January by saying they hate her because she’s a woman.

2014 Billboard Music Awards Fashion: Who Dressed Best?

VIEW GALLERY

Iggy Azalea Wins Top Rap Artist, Earns Wrath of Ice T was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
